value.string:
<tal:block xmlns:draw='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:drawing:1.0' xmlns:office='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:office:1.0' xmlns:text='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:text:1.0' xmlns:ooo='http://openoffice.org/2004/office' xmlns:number='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:datastyle:1.0' xmlns:dc='http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/' xmlns:meta='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:meta:1.0' xmlns:table='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:table:1.0' xmlns:dr3d='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:dr3d:1.0' xmlns:fo='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:xsl-fo-compatible:1.0' xmlns:style='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:style:1.0' xmlns:xforms='http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms' xmlns:form='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:form:1.0' xmlns:script='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:script:1.0' xmlns:ooow='http://openoffice.org/2004/writer' xmlns:svg='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:svg-compatible:1.0' xmlns:chart='urn:oasis:names:tc:opendocument:xmlns:chart:1.0' xmlns:dom='http://www.w3.org/2001/xml-events' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' xmlns:xsd='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance' xmlns:oooc='http://openoffice.org/2004/calc' xmlns:math='http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML' xmlns:tal='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal'
 xmlns:i18n='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n'
 xmlns:metal='http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal'
 tal:attributes='dummy python:request.RESPONSE.setHeader("Content-Type", "text/html;;
 charset=utf-8")'
 office:version='1.0' metal:define-macro="master">
 <tal:block metal:use-macro="here/style_macros/macros/style_macro"/>
 <office:scripts/>
 
 <office:body metal:define-macro="form_layout">
 <office:spreadsheet>
 
 ** ##### listbox: must define the field listbox before calling this macro ! ##### **
 
 <tal:block metal:define-macro="listbox">
 <tal:block tal:define="listboxline_list python: listbox.get_value('default', render_format='list', REQUEST=request);
 selection_name python: listbox.get_value('selection_name', REQUEST=request);
 editable_columns python: listbox.get_value('editable_columns', REQUEST=request);
 editable_fields python: dict([(column[0], getattr(listbox.aq_parent, 'listbox_%s' % column[0], None)) for column in editable_columns]);
 selection python: here.portal_selections.getSelectionFor(selection_name, REQUEST=request);
 is_domain_tree_mode selection/domain_tree_mode | nothing;
 is_report_tree_mode selection/report_tree_mode | nothing;" i18n:domain="ui">
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: len(listboxline_list) > 1">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: is_domain_tree_mode">
 <tal:block tal:define="domain_list python: selection.getDomainList()" tal:condition="python: len(domain_list) > 0" >
 <table:table-column table:style-name="co2"/>
 <table:table-row>
 <table:table-cell office:value-type='string'>
 <text:p tal:content="python: domain_list[-1]" />
 </table:table-cell>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 <tal:block tal:repeat="listboxline python: listboxline_list">
 <table:table-column table:style-name='co2' />
 <tal:block metal:define-slot="for_form_list" tal:condition="listboxline/isTitleLine | python: is_report_tree_mode">
 <tal:block metal:define-slot="list_header">
 <table:table-row table:style-name='ro4'>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: is_report_tree_mode">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='report-column-title' table:number-columns-spanned='1' office:value-type='string' >
 <tal:block tal:condition="listboxline/getSectionName">
 <text:p tal:content="python: here.Localozer.erp5_ui.gettext(listboxline/getSectionName).encode('utf-8')"/>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 
 <table:table-column table:style-name="co2"/>
 <tal:block tal:condition="listboxline/isTitleLine">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item listboxline/getColumnItemList">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1]; column_id python: column_item[0]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None" >
 <table:table-cell table:number-rows-spanned='1' table:style-name='report-column-title' table:number-columns-spanned='1' office:value-type='string' >
 <text:p tal:content="python: column_property">
 </text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None">
 <table:table-cell table:number-rows-spanned='1' table:style-name='report-column-title' table:number-colwithdrawnumns-spanned='1' office:value-type='string'>
 <text:p tal:content="python: ''">
 </text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="not:listboxline/isTitleLine">
 <table:table-column table:style-name="co2"/>
 <table:table-row>
 <tal:block tal:condition="listboxline/isDataLine | python: listboxline.isSummaryLine()">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item listboxline/getColumnItemList">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1]; column_id python: column_item[0]; is_list python:same_type(column_property, []) or same_type(column_property, ())">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: is_list">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='report-content-heading2'>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="item column_property">
 <text:p tal:content="python: here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(item).encode('utf-8')">
 </text:p>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None and not is_list">
 <table:table-cell tal:define="field python: editable_fields.get(column_id, None)" tal:attributes="table:style-name python:isinstance(column_property, (int, long, float)) and 'report-stat2-sans-bold' or 'report-content-heading2'">
 <text:p tal:condition="python: field is None" tal:content="python: column_property" >
 </text:p>
 <text:p tal:condition="python: field is not None"
 tal:content="python: here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(field.render_pdf(column_property)).encode('utf-8')" >
 </text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None">
 <table:table-cell office:value-type='string' table:style-name='report-content-heading2' table:number-columns-spanned='1' >
 <text:p tal:content="python: ''" >
 </text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: listboxline.isStatLine() or listboxline.isSummaryLine()" >
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1]; column_id python: column_item[0]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name="report-stat2-sans-bold" table:number-columns-spanned='1' tal:define="field python: editable_fields.get(column_id, None)" >
 <text:p tal:condition="python: field is None" tal:content="python: column_property">
 </text:p>
 <text:p tal:condition="python: field is not None" tal:content="python:here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(field.render_pdf(column_property)).encode('utf-8')">
 </text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name="report-stat2-sans-bold" table:number-columns-spanned='1' >
 </table:table-cell>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 <table:table-column table:style-name="co2"/>
 <table:table-row metal:define-slot="table_bottom_line">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="listboxline python: listboxline_list">
 <tal:block tal:condition="listboxline/isTitleLine">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item listboxline/getColumnItemList">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1]; ">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='table-bottom-line' table:number-columns-repeated='repeat/column_item/number'/>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </office:spreadsheet>
 </office:body>
 </tal:block>
